Text.Language: Je peniwt etqen niv/oui: mareftoubo n~je pekran: mareci~ n~je tekmetouro: je vwk pe piw~ou sa nie~neh.
Our Father who art in heaven / hallowed be Thy name / Thy kingdom come / for Thine is the glory forever.
